message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS" using the Rail Fence cipher with a depth of 3 rails, we arrange the letters in a zig-zag pattern as follows:

M   E   I
 A T H A T C
  T   M   S

Now, we read the letters from top to bottom, left to right:

MEIATHATCTMS

So, the encrypted message is "MEIATHATCTMS".
